mapper.select: select * from eauserauthorize where 1=1 and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID}
mapper.delete: delete eauserauthorize where 1=1 and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID} and AUTHORIZEID= #{AUTHORIZEID}
